## Rustのコード（.rs）を書く

```rs
#[no_mangle]
pub extern fn fib(n: u32) -> u32 {
    if n == 0 || n == 1 {
        n
    } else {
        fib(n - 1) + fib(n - 2)
    }
}
```

## Cargo.tomlを置く

```toml
[package]
name = "fib"
version = "0.1.0"
authors = ["yutannihilation <XXXXXXXX@example.com>"]

[lib]
name = "fib"
crate-type = ["dylib"]
```

## Rの関数をつくる

```r
fib <- function(x){
  Rffi::callCIF(
    cif = Rffi::prepCIF(
      retType  = Rffi::uint32Type,
      argTypes = list(Rffi::uint32Type)
    ),
    sym = "fib",
    x
  )
}
```

## It works

動いた！

```r
fib(40L)
#> [1] 102334155
```
